duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and grow existing customer base; consistently update customer database.
Implement sales plans and achieve sales goals and objectives set for the geographic territory.
Educate customers on products, procedures, and industry trends through use of our clinical education program and by performing virtual trainings.
Adhere to and ensure the compliance of company's Code of Ethics, all Company policies, rules, procedures and housekeeping standards.
Overcome technical and business objections of prospective customers.
Handle inbound and outbound calls, emails and faxes related to the product ordering process.
Travel occasionally to attend trade shows or field visit with customers.
Maintain thorough knowledge of company's products and exhibit understanding of industry competition.
Interface with key departments within the organization and specialized teams within Customer Service in support of the order placement processes.
Responsible for purchase order processing, including necessary steps to identify customer accounts; verify credit status; pricing, and inventory levels.
Professionally communicate (verbally and written) with customers while providing accurate and timely processing of their purchase orders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (BA/BS) from four-year college or university with emphasis in Science/ Business desired; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Three (3) years inside sales or related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Experience using value selling or target account selling methodology preferred.
